reviews.review_msg: His handwriting was atrocious. Didn't provide any notes. Didn't record his lectures. Used two overheads at once. Can't write your notes down fast enough and try to pay attention to what he was saying. Exams were brutal. Would give you 50 minutes to do a 2 hour exam. Average grade for the class was 35%? I was lucky to pass thanks to the curve.
she's nice and highly knowledgeable. best choice for 201/301. the textbook is optional
